channel.title: Need help on "My Source" Please Look!
channel.description:
I got Frugoo Scape, i edited it so it shows im the owner n tht but this is what i get. [code]Dont close this window. It will close on it's own. Checking For update Error Checking for Updates. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.writeString(stream.java:234) at client.sendFrame126(client.java:9392) at client.initialize(client.java:15175) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:204) at server.main(server.java:66) [/code]
When i click Edit on the file it shows this [code]@echo off title Running Server echo Dont close this window. It will close on it's own. java -Xmx512m -jar frugooscape.jar server exit[/code] Is that set to a certain folder? PLEASE HELP IM BEGGING U!! : :(

item.title: Need help on "My Source" Please Look!

@ironforg2 wrote:

dude send me your source code pleaase

item.title: Need help on "My Source" Please Look!

item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

I got Frugoo Scape, i edited it so it shows im the owner n tht but this is what i get.

Dont close this window. It will close on it's own. Checking For update Error Checking for Updates. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.writeString(stream.java:234) at client.sendFrame126(client.java:9392) at client.initialize(client.java:15175) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:204) at server.main(server.java:66)

When i click Edit on the file it shows this

@echo off title Running Server echo Dont close this window. It will close on it's own. java -Xmx512m -jar frugooscape.jar server exit
Is that set to a certain folder? PLEASE HELP IM BEGGING U!! :
